# VC Scout

A precision AI scout for Venture Capital firms to streamline startup sourcing and triage.

## Core Features
- Discovery: Faceted search with intelligence table.
- AI Enrichment: On-demand scraping and analysis using AI.
- Pipeline Management: Custom lists and persistent internal notes.

## Technical Details
- Framework: Next.js 14+ (App Router)
- CSS: Vanilla CSS with Global Design Tokens.
- Data Interaction: Local storage persistence for user-specific data.

## Documentation
- Product Requirements (docs/PRD.md)
- Technical Specifications (docs/FSD.md)
- User Guide (docs/Help.md)
